name: Hotel Tourism
discretion: Tourism-related website. Users can log in with Firebase authentication (Google Github).Through this website, users can get any hotel service. Click on Booking Now, but before that must log in. Users will be able to see the private page when logged in - My Order, Manage All Order, Add New Service. This website has some more services - courier service, resort service, tour guide service, guest house, sports tourism. Users will be able to all these services through this website
Technology: React, React Bootstrap, Material UI, React Router, React hook form, React router hash link, Firebase Authentication, Private-route.

name: perfume pride
discretion: My website name is Perfume Price. This website is Niche website. This website is Perfume related only. This is a niche website and perfume-related. This website has two dashboards - user and admin. This is a niche website and perfume-related. This website has two dashboards -user and admin. The user needs to log in or register before ordering. Then be able to order the product. User Dashboard - Payment, add a review, my order page. Admin can add, remove and update any product. Admin Dashboard - Manage All Orders, Add A Product, Make Admin, Manage Products page that only admins can see, not users.
Technology: React, React Bootstrap, Material UI, React Router, React hook form, React router hash link, Firebase Authentication, Private-route.

name: LifeLine Medical
discretion: This project-based online medical service concept can be found and this website is usually about medical services, healthcare, medical teams, appointments. We can take any service but you must log in first. If you click on a service, then see the details of those services. Users need to log in (Google, GitHub, Email, and Password) with firebase.y
Technology: React bootstrap, plain bootstrap, plain CSS are used.
